pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/remorses/async-graphql/tree/master.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/remorses/async-graphql/tree/master)Make graphql requests asynchronously, python 2.7 and more required.Soon will come graphql subscriptions.The library is tiny, memory usage loading the module is also is good:```Line # Mem usage Increment Line Contents================================================ 12 10.9 MiB 10.9 MiB @profile 13 def profiled(): 14 13.0 MiB 2.1 MiB import asyncio 15 13.0 MiB 0.0 MiB async def main(loop): 16 13.5 MiB 0.5 MiB from async_graphql import Client, errors```This is good when using graphql in lots of replicated micro-services to not go out of memory.
